title: Aerial Bane
info: The Aerial Bane is a Hardmode, post-Golem bow which is dropped by Betsy during the Old One's Army event. It has the unique ability of splitting into 6 arrows every time the bow is fired. Additionally, it deals 50% bonus damage and causes additional projectiles to spawn when hitting any flying enemy, hence its name "Aerial Bane".
